DOC.brief_title: Prevention Positives : An RCT Among Vietnamese HIV-positive IDU
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize control trial among HIV-positive inject drug user ( IDUs ) reduce high risk inject sexual behavior Thai Nguyen , Vietnam . We conduct study collaboration Thai Nguyen Centre Preventive Medicine ( CPM ) . We compare standard HIV voluntary counseling testing ( VCT ) intervention add continuum psychosocial support HIV-positive IDUs . The intervention consist two-tiered approach address structural individual level barrier risk reduction : 1 ) The structural level intervention consist community-based program target HIV stigma primary obstacle risk reduction HIV-positive individual ; 2 ) The individual level intervention consist 2 HIV posttest counseling session 2 skill-building support group HIV-positive IDUs . Our research question overall project : 1 . What impact perceive HIV-related stigma disclosure , social support , cop among IDUs ? 2 . What roles disclosure , social support , cop play facilitate reduction HIV-risk behavior 3 . Are combine individual structural level intervention effective reduce inject sexual behavior among HIV-positive IDUs individual structural intervention alone effective standard HIV VCT ?
